RimForge.AlloyDef.label: make gold doré
RimForge.AlloyDef.description: Make gold doré, a semi-pure alloy of gold and silver. Not very useful as a material due to it's softness, but exceedingly beautiful.

RimForge.AlloyDef.label: make gilded plasteel
RimForge.AlloyDef.description: Make gilded plasteel, an alloy of plasteel and gold. Retains the toughness of plasteel but becomes more malleable, leading to faster construction times. It's also very pretty to look at.

RimForge.AlloyDef.label: make staballoy
RimForge.AlloyDef.description: Incredibly dense and resitant to blunt and sharp damage, but very ugly to look at. It's strength allows to to be forged into wickedly sharp bladed weapons, but the wielder may find the weight overwhelming.
